snippet: Texas fails in an effort to obtain a temporary restraining order to stop entry of Syrian refugees trying to resettle in the state while a suit against the federal government over refugees is pending.
abstract: Federal Judge David C Godbey declines to grant request from Texas attorney general's office that would have barred Syrian refugees from entering state; move is part of national Republican effort to keep out refugees following Paris attacks.
lead_paragraph: Texas fails in an effort to obtain a temporary restraining order to stop entry of Syrian refugees trying to resettle in the state while a suit against the federal government over refugees is pending.

headline.main: Texas Fails to Block Entry of Syrian Refugees
headline.print_headline: Texas Fails to Block Entry of Syrian Refugees

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
